LanguageData.VCE_CookSoupSimple.label: prepare simple soup
LanguageData.VCE_CookSoupSimple.description: Prepare a simple uncooked soup quickly made from a few ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookSoupFine.label: prepare fine soup
LanguageData.VCE_CookSoupFine.description: Prepare a fine uncooked soup assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookSoupLavish.label: prepare lavish soup
LanguageData.VCE_CookSoupLavish.description: Prepare a lavish uncooked soup. A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this soup nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.VCE_CookSoupGourmet.label: prepare gourmet soup
LanguageData.VCE_CookSoupGourmet.description: Prepare a gourmet uncooked soup. A culinary work of art, characterized by refined, even elaborate preparation and presentation of an aesthetically balanced, albeit low quantity soup.\n\nThis recipe does not allow mixed ingredients, and takes a long time to make.
